channel.title: ConceptionX || Full Clan Chat || Full Castle War || Fully Clipped || Custom Maps
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/2783/banneryq.png[/img] [img]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/1870/conceptb.png[/img][/center] The concept of the game is pretty simple. ConceptionX is not like any other servers. It has some unique Features about it and we will do allot more then you see right now. We are planning on make custom quests with rewards and a story's lines. Custom maps are giving an graphic atmosphere about the feeling so its not any other rsps server. We are working on all time we can. We already did some good things. This an economic server. That means so there will be Pking,Skilling,Monster Killing,Quest and Minigames.
[center][img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/6352/teamlm.png[/img][/center] We have any limits in our team. There no Owner on the server. We have Moderators,Administrators and Developers. Each Member groupe has his own Permissions.
[b]Team:[/b]
[ul][li]Xion - Me[/li][/ul]
[b]To be in:[/b] To get in to the team you got to reply this thread by using those formats: [code] How old are you?: Email or Skype: How good you are in Java ( /10): Any other work you did before?: Why you want to Join?: What Position You want to take?: Any other Informtion?: [/code]
[center][img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/3015/featuresk.png[/img][/center] Those are some features that the server currently have. There will be many more by the way.
[ul][li]Awsomme Stability[/li] [li]Full Clipping[/li] [li]Full Clan chat[/li] [li]Full Castle wars[/li] [li]Full Pest Control[/li] [li]474-525 Gameframe switcher[/li][/ul]
[center][img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/4992/mediaon.png[/img][/center] Will be added in Development tread. If needed will just post one.

item.title: ConceptionX || Full Clan Chat || Full Castle War || Fully Clipped || Custom Maps
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“liamp, post:21, topic:420065”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=522624.msg3801978#msg3801978 date=1320101129]

How old are you?: 16
Email or Skype: mrrushed@hotmail.co.uk
How good you are in Java (6/10):
Any other work you did before?: I am actually working on my server but can work on this server as coder admin or mod any won’t really mind.
Why you want to Join?: This looks really good and I want to participate in helping the server.
What Position You want to take?: Coder, Admin, Mod, Forum Manager - Any Of These
Any other Informtion?: Im quite a medium coder so I am not so pro and can’t do alot and I am still learning + I can make a really beast smf forum. Example: www.splitrush.smfnew.com

Accepted Get Skype and add me “artem5432”

How old are you?: 14 Email or Skype: xd-007-xd@hotmail.com / indrekxd How good you are in Java (8/10): Any other work you did before?: Havent released any. Why you want to Join?: Because i like this and i want to test my coding skills. What Position You want to take?: Coder - Server + Client (Most client side), Administrator or Forum Developer. Any other Informtion?: Ive owned & coded many servers before and i have worked more then 2 years with rsps's. Ive been playng rs since 2004. And i can also make pretty websites with html, php and i also can use mysql + i know much about computers and different programs.

Accepted Get Skype and add me “artem5432”
[/quote]
add pictures off ur server[/quote]
Why i need add pictures? Its not needed.

Read full topic

Why you want to Join?: Experience
What Position You want to take?: Developer
Any other Informtion?: Fairly decent with java, decent with php[/quote]
Why your Rep is low?

A New LIght:

This is a 317 or a 474? When you say clan chat is it dialogue based or interface based?

Its 317. Its currently fully working Dialogue based. But it will be Interface With the Main Configuration one. Its 100% with the folowing features:

[ul][li]Deleting
Saving
Promoting
Inviting
Renaming[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

item.title: ConceptionX || Full Clan Chat || Full Castle War || Fully Clipped || Custom Maps
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[center]
[/center]
The concept of the game is pretty simple. ConceptionX is not like any other servers. It has some unique Features about it and we will do allot more then you see right now. We are planning on make custom quests with rewards and a story’s lines. Custom maps are giving an graphic atmosphere about the feeling so its not any other rsps server. We are working on all time we can. We already did some good things. This an economic server. That means so there will be Pking,Skilling,Monster Killing,Quest and Minigames.

[center][/center]
We have any limits in our team. There no Owner on the server. We have Moderators,Administrators and Developers. Each Member groupe has his own Permissions.

Team:

[ul][li]Xion - Me[/li][/ul]

To be in:
To get in to the team you got to reply this thread by using those formats:

How old are you?:
Email or Skype:
How good you are in Java ( /10):
Any other work you did before?:
Why you want to Join?:
What Position You want to take?:
Any other Informtion?:

[center][/center]
Those are some features that the server currently have. There will be many more by the way.

[ul][li]Awsomme Stability[/li]
[li]Full Clipping[/li]
[li]Full Clan chat[/li]
[li]Full Castle wars[/li]
[li]Full Pest Control[/li]
[li]474-525 Gameframe switcher[/li][/ul]

[center][/center]
Will be added in Development tread. If needed will just post one.
